content.rendered:
The Outback Armour 10T/5M Tree Trunk Protector is a handy utility strap for anchoring your winch recovery to a single tree or around a clump of bushes if a single strong tree is not available. Sometimes options are limited in the outback.

This strap is certified and rated to 10 tonnes for safety and should surpass winch stall capacity on 4WD winches.

Features of this strap include: cordura shielded eyes, neoprene sleeves to protect the stitching from abrasion and velcro keepers for tidy storage.

Specifications Details
Length: 5 meters
Strength: 10 tonnes
Colour: bush green
Material: polyester

excerpt.rendered: Never go alone.. but you’ll need your own straps for recovery!
